meanings.definition: The spread of cancer cells from one part of the body to another.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that metastasis occurs when cancer cells travel to new areas.
meanings.sent2: Metastasis is a serious concern in cancer treatment.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells decided to go on a road trip, causing metastasis in the body.
meanings.sent4: Like a stealthy invader, metastasis silently spreads cancer cells throughout the body.
meanings.sent5: The concept of metastasis is like a sneaky spy, infiltrating different body regions.

meanings.definition: The process by which something is transformed into a different form.
meanings.sent1: During cooking, the metastasis of ingredients creates a delicious dish.
meanings.sent2: Metastasis can be seen in the caterpillar's transformation into a butterfly.
meanings.sent3: The metamorphosis of the tadpole showcased a unique form of metastasis.
meanings.sent4: Just like a caterpillar turning into a butterfly, metamorphosis is a form of metastasis in nature.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece showed the metastasis of colors blending into a beautiful painting.
